Blood.NAME: Blood
DESCRIPTION: Heal #b2 HP at the start of your turn.
Heal #b3 HP at the start of your turn.

Calendar.NAME: Calendar
DESCRIPTION: Deals #b40 damage to all enemies on shattering.
Deals #b40 damage to all enemies on shattering.

Calipers.NAME: Calipers
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, lose #b
#yBlock rather than all of your #yBlock.

Carbon.NAME: Carbon
DESCRIPTION: Adds #b3 additional slow to slowed enemies at the start of your turn.
Applies #b3 slow to ALL enemies at the start of your turn.

Flame.NAME: Flame
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw a random #yAttack.
At the start of your turn, choose an #yAttack from your #yDeck.

Thunder.NAME: Thunder
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw a random #ySkill.
At the start of your turn, choose an #ySkill from your #yDeck.

Tornado.NAME: Tornado
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw a random #yPower.
At the start of your turn, choose an #yPower from your #yDeck.

Hand.NAME: Hand
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a #yPower, a random card in your hand costs #b1 energy less for the turn.
Whenever you play a #yPower, a random card in your hand costs #b2 energy less for the turn.

IceCream.NAME: Ice Cream
DESCRIPTION: Conserve energy between turns.
Gain 1 energy at the start of your turn, and conserve energy between turns.

Medicine.NAME: Medicine
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a #yStatus card, #yExhaust it.
Whenever you draw a #yStatus card, #yExhaust it and draw a card.

Mercury.NAME: Mercury
DESCRIPTION: Deal #b3 damage to ALL enemies at the start of your turn.
Deal #b5 damage to ALL enemies at the start of your turn.

Nitrogen.NAME: Nitrogen
DESCRIPTION: Gain #b2 #yFocus.
Gain #b3 #yFocus.

Orichalcum.NAME: Orichalcum
DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn without #yBlock, gain #b6 #yBlock.
If you end your turn without #yBlock, gain #b8 #yBlock.

Plans.NAME: Plans
DESCRIPTION: Retain #b1 card.
Retain #b2 cards.

Thread.NAME: Thread
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain #b1 #yPlated #yArmor.
At the start of your turn, gain #b2 #yPlated #yArmor.

Rock.NAME: Rock
DESCRIPTION: Deals #b1 damage to you on shattering.
Deals #b1 damage to you on shattering.

Whetstone.NAME: Whetstone
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, upgrade an Attack in your hand for the rest of combat.
At the start of your turn, upgrade ALL Attacks in your hand for the rest of combat.

WarPaint.NAME: War Paint
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, upgrade a Skill in your hand for the rest of combat.
At the start of your turn, upgrade ALL Skills in your hand for the rest of combat.

Urn.NAME: Urn
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a #yPower, heal #b2 HP.
Whenever you play a #yPower, heal #b3 HP.
